headline.main: Congress Looking Into the Diet Business

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A CONGRESSMAN who has investigated the misuse of infertility drugs and cosmetic surgery over the last decade threw down the gauntlet before the diet industry this week.
docs.snippet: LEAD: A CONGRESSMAN who has investigated the misuse of infertility drugs and cosmetic surgery over the last decade threw down the gauntlet before the diet industry this week.

docs.section_name: Home and Garden; Health; Education; Style
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: FOR nearly four decades, health and fitness experts, educators, parents, even Presidents, have prodded and cajoled and used other powers of persuasion in a futile attempt to whip America's youngsters into shape. Not only was there a collective sense that Johnny couldn't read; he couldn't touch his toes either.
